whole_object: It seems the screens in this classroom are really trying to excel in their field, but they're all just projecting an image!
single_object:
- Computers: These computers must be great comedians – they have a lot of good bytes.
- Projector: This projector is so old school, it still thinks powerpoint is the peak of visual effects.
- Desks: This desk's career is flat out impressive – it's a top-notch surface performer.
- Chairs: These chairs must be in politics, they always back up the sitting member.
- Screen: This screen has seen so much drama, it’s considering a career in acting.
multi_object:
- Computers  
- Projector  
- "These computers are so bright, they might just outshine the projector at the next talent show!"  

- Projector  
- Desks  
- "The projector is feeling a bit overshadowed by the desks; it just wants to beam with pride!"  

- Desks  
- Chairs  
- "The desks are tired of being the support system; they wish the chairs would take a seat and share the load!"  

- Chairs  
- Screen  
- "These chairs are ready for a movie night, but the screen keeps saying, 'I’m not just a pretty face!'"  

- Screen  
- Computers  
- "The screen is tired of being the main attraction; it thinks the computers should take a byte out of the spotlight!"
